title: Problem-Solving Lab
description: Interactive drills that help teams test, iterate, and reflect in real time.
subject: Professional Skills
learning_objectives: Select appropriate collaboration rituals for rapid experiments.
Use structured feedback to improve prototype ideas.

cover_image.alt: Teammates planning on a digital whiteboard

instructions.content: Pair up and brainstorm as many *unexpected uses* for your prototype as possible in 90 seconds.
Add each idea to the sticky note board, labelling it with your initials.

accessibility.instructions: Use verbal prompts for remote learners and confirm everyone can access the whiteboard link.

dropzones.instructions: Drag risks you can influence directly.

instructions.content: Discuss which rituals keep the team aware of emerging issues.

feedback_region.positive: Great classification—share a quick rationale for each placement.

negative.content: Review the [influence vs. concern](https://example.org/influence-matrix) matrix before retrying.

feedback_region.neutral: If risks span multiple zones, duplicate the token with a new colour.

prompt.content: Place each milestone token in the *Phase* column, then assign an owner.

accessibility.summary: Read the column headers aloud and confirm screen reader focus order using the Tab key.

token_bank.description: Spend two minutes hearing the idea fully.

quiz_prompts.question: Which ritual prevents assumptions when teams react to new data?

rationale.content: Listening fully ensures teams respond to facts rather than guesses.

question.content: The team rushed into solution mode without defining success. Select the **two** rituals that reset alignment.

completion_copy.positive: You’re ready to facilitate the debrief!
completion_copy.negative: Review the ritual cheat sheet and retry the quiz.

quiz_items.prompt: Which ritual prevents assumptions when teams react to new data?
quiz_items.explanation: Listening expands understanding before committing to action.

quiz_items.prompt: The team rushed into solution mode without defining success.
quiz_items.explanation: Combine clarify with reframe to restore shared success metrics.

positive.content: Celebrate accurate responses with a quick shout-out round.

feedback_region.negative: Highlight how clarifying questions surface hidden assumptions.

next_steps.content: Assign each participant a ritual to test during the next sprint review.
